item.title: Wolverine: Old Man Logan, Vol. 0: Warzones!
item.description: A followup to Wolverine: Old Man Logan and a quick stop in the Battleworlds that predate Secret Wars. It’s a fascinating bit of story, with poor ‘Old Man’ Logan bouncing between a world (or two) where the X-Men live, a world where anyone not in Iron man armor contracts a techno virus, and a world of the dead. On the other hand, it doesn’t really go anywhere–not until we get to Secret Wars itself.
